headline: DDoS threat report for 2023 Q2
keywords: DDoS, Cloudflare Radar, DDoS Reports, Insights, Trends, Killnet, REvil, Anonymous
description: Q2 2023 saw an unprecedented escalation in DDoS attack sophistication. Pro-Russian hacktivists REvil, Killnet and Anonymous Sudan joined forces to attack Western sites. Mitel vulnerability exploits surged by a whopping 532%, and attacks on crypto rocketed up by 600%.
